Softw.Techn. for Learning and Teach. +31 30 253 4183 m.j.s.brinkhuis@uu.nl Buys Ballotgebouw Princetonplein 5 Kamer 4.17 (TMP) 3584 CC Utrecht Dr. M.J.S. (Matthieu) Brinkhuis Programme Director Information and computing sciences Associate Professor Softw.Techn. for Learning and Teach. +31 30 253 4183 m.j.s.brinkhuis@uu.nl Profile Publications Teaching Ancillary activities Contact Profile Publications Teaching Ancillary activities Contact Areas of expertise Data Analysis Psychometrics Applied Data Science Data Science Educational Leadership Interdisciplinary Education Interdisciplinary Teaching and Learning Skills Data Science Advice Cooperation with External Partners Cooperation Contracts Learning Analytics Research areas AI Labs Applied Data Science Governing the Digital Society Higher Education Research Human-centered Artificial Intelligence Utrecht Platform for Applied Data Science Director of education at the department of Information and Computing Sciences. Senior Fellow at the Centre for Academic Teaching and Learning. My main research interest is learning analytics, bringing together computational psychometrics, AI in education, and learning technology to answer societal challenges.
